title: Dielectrics - how do capacitance and field change

content.question:
A parallel plate capacitor with air between the plates is charged and then disconnected from the source of <math alttext="e m f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>emf</mi></math>. If the space between the plates is now filled with a dielectric material, what happens to the capacitance of the capacitor and the magnitude of the electric field between the plates?
CapacitanceMagnitude of the Electric FieldAIncreasesIncreasesBIncreasesDecreasesCDecreasesIncreasesDDecreasesDecreases

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
